description.raw:
Basic code and instructions to run our jenkins scripts from desktop machines. Some features:

1. It allows to generate .deb in the local machine.
1. It allows to use a local release-tool repository, useful when developing release-tools and want a quick test without commit and run in jenkins.
1. It allows to use a local software code repository, useful to be sure there is nothing broken from a clean installation.
description.html:
Basic code and instructions to run our jenkins scripts from desktop machines. Some features:

  1. It allows to generate .deb in the local machine.
  2. It allows to use a local release-tool repository, useful when developing release-tools and want a quick test without commit and run in jenkins.
  3. It allows to use a local software code repository, useful to be sure there is nothing broken from a clean installation.

title.raw: Initial support to run OSRF jenkins scripts without jenkins
title.html: Initial support to run OSRF jenkins scripts without jenkins
